[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@theatre/core](./core.md) &gt; [IProject](./core.iproject.md) &gt; [ready](./core.iproject.ready.md)

## IProject.ready property

If `@theatre/studio` is used, this promise would resolve when studio has loaded the state of the project into memory.

If `@theatre/studio` is not used, this promise is already resolved.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly ready: Promise<void>;
```
